entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023
